Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Regina Daniels bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood ama ama ekwuola maka etu imụta nwa si gbanwe ndụ ya.
O kwukwara ihe mere ọtụtụ ndị ntoroọbịa Igbo anaghị amụta Igbo n'oge.
Ihe Somadina kwuru maka Regina Daniels, ESN na Biafra
Izu ụka a bụ nke  Laila Charani nwunye m- Ned Nwoko
Asịrị e jiri m gbaa na 'social media' ka wutekarịcha m- Ned Nwoko
Gere ihe ndị ọzọ o kwuru ihe mere o ji belata aka n'ịnara agwa ugbua n'ihe nkiri Nollywood ugbua.
